title: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251. In a default text editor, when typing in the following: a space, some tabs, some text, some tabs, some text2, and then highlighting the two lines and executing ShiftLeft, nothing moves.
OB: When executing ShiftLeft on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces, the selected lines do not move in the text editor.
SR: Ensure that when executing ShiftLeft on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces, the selected lines are properly shifted to the left in the text editor.
